This is an HTML template and the layered PSD included. I'm sure you're wondering... “Can I see the demo? where is the demo?”
When you’re reading this message you’re viewing the demo, now. Amaze Landing Page template is the template that we use right now on this page you’re viewing.

This package contains 40 background pattern images in PNG and PSD format. You can use it for your website, mockup and everything you want to do with it.
The PNG format allows to use it as soon as possible. The PSD format allows you to do many customizations with the graphic.

So Versatile and Flexible You can build company website, blog, review site, affiliate site, gallery site, etc. There’re many type of websites you can build with this theme.
Mobile Ready It’s fully responsive plus has custom mobile design, it’s compatible with all devices, looks stunning on all devices.
Support Retina Display ElegantBiz includes ultra sharp retina graphics so it looks stunning on all Retina-Displays and other High Resolution screens.

Shortcode Central It’s just simple and easy to use, but has dozens of powerful features and styles.
Drag & Drop Layout Editor It just got better here on v2.0, we have added lot of features. You’re going to love this amazing drag & drop.
Compatible with WooCommerce Plugin So you want to build an ecommerce site? Don’t worry, this theme is compatible with WooCommerce.
